faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know before starting

q1.q: Is there a monthly fee or maintenance fee?
q1.a: No. Zero. You buy the batch of licenses and they are yours forever until you use them. If it takes 1 month or 1 year to sell, it doesn't matter. Your licenses never expire.

q2.q: What if my client loses their phone?
q2.a: Access is linked to the account, not the device. Photos and data are saved in the cloud with redundant backup. It's safer than an external hard drive ‚Äî just log in on the new phone.

q3.q: Does the end client pay anything?
q3.a: No. Lifetime access is a differentiator you include in the package (or sell as an upsell). For the parent, the app is free and ad-free. You add value to your service.

q4.q: How do I deliver photos to the client?
q4.a: You get access to the Partner Panel. Upload high-res photos, generate a unique code and send it to the client (physical or digital). They download the app, enter the code and done ‚Äî in less than 2 minutes.

q5.q: What if I don't like it, is there a warranty?
q5.a: Yes! We offer a 7-day warranty. If you are not satisfied, we refund your investment without bureaucracy. We trust the product so much we take the risk.
